option.chatnotify.advanced.block.tooltip: If enabled, any message activating this notification will be blocked from chat.
option.chatnotify.advanced.exclusion.too: If an exclusion trigger is detected in a message, it will prevent this notification from activating.
option.chatnotify.advanced.reset.level_1: Reset all advanced settings for THIS notification.
option.chatnotify.advanced.reset.level_2: Are you sure you want to reset all advanced settings for ALL notifications?
Reset all advanced settings for ALL notifications.
option.chatnotify.advanced.reset.level_3: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications and reset all settings?
Delete all notifications and reset all settings.
option.chatnotify.advanced.response.time: Time in ticks to wait (after the previous message, if any) before sending.
option.chatnotify.advanced.response.tool: Chat messages or commands to be sent when this notification is activated.

CommandKeys response.
If the CommandKeys mod is loaded (version 2.3.1 or later), this response will trigger all macros with keybinds matching the key IDs you set.

Key ID.

Example: If the keybind is [LEFT CONTROL + B], this field should be 'key.keyboard.b'.

Modifier Key ID.

Example: If the keybind is [LEFT CONTROL + B], this field should be 'key.keyboard.left.control'.

If the keybind only uses a single key, set this to 'key.keyboard.unknown'.

Regex response message.
Use (1), (2) etc in the message to access regex groups from the trigger.
Warning: Can crash the game, use with caution.
option.chatnotify.advanced.title: Title Text %s
option.chatnotify.advanced.title.tooltip: Large-font text displayed center-screen when the notification is activated.
option.chatnotify.global.compat_send.too: If ON, response messages will be sent via a Chat Screen. This may help with compatibility with other mods, but could cause other issues.
option.chatnotify.global.debug.all.toolt: Full message processing info will be written to the game log.
option.chatnotify.global.mixin.tooltip:
If ChatNotify is not detecting incoming messages, try changing this.

Note: Auto mode defaults to OFF but will switch ON if a chat history mod such as ChatPatches is detected.
option.chatnotify.global.multi_notif.all: Multiple notifications can be activated per message, all sounds will be played.
option.chatnotify.global.multi_notif.off: Only one notification can be activated per message.
option.chatnotify.global.multi_notif.one: Multiple notifications can be activated per message, only one sound will be played.
option.chatnotify.global.multi_restyle.t: If ON, ChatNotify will attempt to restyle all instances of the trigger or style target in the message, not just the first.
option.chatnotify.global.prefixes.toolti:
A prefix is a character or command that you type before a message to modify it.
For example, '!' or '/shout' may be used on some servers to communicate in global chat.
This may be useful for preventing spurious notifications.
option.chatnotify.global.regex.tooltip: If ON, you can set any trigger to be interpreted as regex by clicking the [.*] button next to the trigger field.
option.chatnotify.global.self_notify.too:
If ON, messages sent by you will be able to trigger notifications.

Note: ChatNotify will only detect a message as being sent by you if it matches a trigger of the first notification.
option.chatnotify.global.sound_source.to: The sound source determines which of Minecraft's volume control sliders will affect the notification sound.
option.chatnotify.main.notifs.tooltip: Incoming messages will activate the first enabled notification that has a matching trigger.
option.chatnotify.notif.style_string.too:
Normally ChatNotify will attempt to restyle the part of the message that matches the trigger, unless the trigger is a key or a regex pattern.
Setting a style target string allows you to specify exactly what you want to restyle.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.text.pla: Click on a message from the list below
Translation Key Trigger

This type of trigger will activate the notification if the message is translatable and the translation key contains the trigger.

Use the global option 'Debug: Key' to view the keys of new chat messages.

Normal Trigger

This type of trigger will activate the notification if the message contains the trigger by itself (not as part of a word).

(Not case-sensitive, allows for symbols including punctuation).

Regex Trigger

This type of trigger will activate the notification if the message matches the regex pattern.
option.chatnotify.notif.triggers.tooltip:
If a trigger is detected in a chat message, the notification will be activated.
Note: Normal triggers are NOT case-sensitive.
